X.ii.6.F.5.c
.
Continuing Awards While on Non-Bed Care
Continue payments to a Veteran on non-bed care, as Veterans have the right under
38 CFR 13.30(b)(1)
to receive direct monthly benefit payments until VA appoints a fiduciary.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 6, Section F - Awards Specific to Institutionalized, Incompetent Veterans
citation: Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 6, Section F
